Event ID: 001
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Twine City Pokémon Center!
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 8, 3
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 8, 3
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
:       : for i in 1..count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 8, 3
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 8, 3
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

Event ID: 002

(X,Y): (009,007)

Graphic: trchar007

Autonomous Movement

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:

 @>Script: pbFirstAblePokemon(1)
 @>Script: pkmn=pbGetPokemon(1)
 :       : $game_variables[1] = 0
 :       : if pkmn.shiny?
 :       :   $game_variables[1] = 1
 :       : end
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 1
  @>Show Animation: This event, [Exclaim no audio]
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Text: \rIs that a shiny Pokémon you have there?
  @>Text: \rMind me showing it to my boyfriend in order to stop him from looking outside?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Script: pbToggleFollowingPokemon("off",true)
   @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
   @>Scroll Map: Left, 2, 4
   @>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Down
    @>Set Move Route: Player
     :              : $>Turn Left
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Move Down
     :              : $>Move Down
     :              : $>Move Left
     :              : $>Move Left
     :              : $>Move Left
     :              : $>Move Left
     :              : $>Move Up
     :              : $>Move Up
     :              : $>Move Up
     :              : $>Move Right
     :              : $>Turn Up
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>
   : Else
    @>Set Move Route: Player
     :              : $>Move Up
     :              : $>Turn Left
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Move Up
     :              : $>Move Left
     :              : $>Move Left
     :              : $>Move Left
     :              : $>Turn Up
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Screen Shake: 9, 5, @10
   @>Text: \rHEY JEREMY! LOOK AT THIS!
   @>Text: \rLook at this shiny Pokémon, isn't it pretty?
   @>Set Move Route: [Jeremy]
    :              : $>Direction Fix OFF
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   @>Show Animation: [Jeremy], [Exclaim no audio]
   @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   @>Text: Jeremy: \bPretty cool, though you should probably return it to that trainer over there.
   @>Text: \rWell, uh, it's...
   @>Set Move Route: [Jeremy]
    :              : $>Turn Up
    :              : $>Direction Fix ON
   @>Text: Jeremy: \bI hope I didnt miss that shiny Taillow just now.
   @>Text: \rWill you stop looking out that damn window for once and look me in the eyes?
   @>Text: \rDo you even love me?
   @>Text: Jeremy: \bI sure do.
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Right
   @>Text: \rWell, I'm done. Trainer, here's your Pokemon back. I'm leaving!
   @>Script: pbToggleFollowingPokemon("on",true)
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Move Left
    :              : $>Move Left
    :              : $>Move Down
    :              : $>Move Down
    :              : $>Move Down
   @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @8
   @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   @>Play SE: 'Door exit', 80, 100
   @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
   @>Set Event Location: This event,(009,007)
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @8
   @>Script: vSST(1)
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \rHow unfortunate... I was gonna give it back though.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rI wonder what I have to do for him to look at me? Perhaps show him a shiny Pokémon?
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rHe's always looking outside that window. I wonder what I have to do for him to look at me?
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>

: When [Yes]
 @>Memorize BGM/BGS
 @>Fade Out BGM: 1 sec.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-20,-20,-20,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Play BGM: 'DPPT 040 Floaroma Town (Night)', 80, 100
 @>Text: \pgDo: give Pokémon a lot of attention. A lot of Pokémon have separation anxiety.
 @>Text: \pgDon't: stare at wild Pokémon, this could seem like a challenge to them and you could get attacked by them.
 @>Text: \pgDo: leave mother Pokémon alone, as they are very protective of their babies, and will attack if you seem like a threat.
 @>Text: \pgDon't: feed wild Pokémon. As this could lead into an investation of wild Pokémon, expecting to be fed.
 @>Text: \pgDo: groom your furry Pokémon. As their fur is very important to all furry Pokémon. It's kind of a part of their pride.
 @>Text: \pgDon't: pet any other trainers their Pokémon, as this could lead to jelousy in your own Pokémon, when they smell another trainer their Pokémon's scent on you.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>Fade Out BGM: 2 sec.
 @>Text: \PN: \pgThat could come in handy maybe.
 @>Restore BGM/BGS
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100
@>Text: You put the book back.
@>

 @>Text: \bWe don't know how it got there, but your Pokémon

 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ReceiveEgg
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.party_full?
   @>Text: \bYou have no room for it right now... Come back 
    :    : when you've made room.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>

   :    : Man.
  @>Text: \bYou take good care of it.
  @>Script: DayCare.collect_egg
  @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg = 0
  :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps = 0
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bI really will keep it. You do want this Egg, yes?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Jump to Label: ReceiveEgg
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \bWell all right then, I'll take it. Thank you.
   @>Text: \bThat is, I don't think we'll ever find another...
   @>Text: \bNo, no, I'm sure we'll find another one. I'm definitely 
    :    : sure of it!
   @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg = 0
   :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps = 0
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>

 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 0

   :    : trainers.

  @>Text: \bYour \v[3] is doing just fine.
  @>
 : Branch End

  @>Script: DayCare.get_details(0, 3, -1)
  :       : DayCare.get_details(1, 4, -1)
  :       : DayCare.get_compatibility(5)

  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 0
   @>Text: \bThe two play with other Pokémon rather than with 
    :    : each other...
   @>
  : Branch End

Event ID: 001
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Toledo Village Pokémon Center!
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 8, 3
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 8, 3
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
:       : for i in 1..count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 8, 3
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 8, 3
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

Autonomous Movement

Freq: 3: Low

@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Memorize BGM/BGS
 @>Fade Out BGM: 1 sec.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-20,-20,-20,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Play BGM: 'DPPT 040 Floaroma Town (Night)', 80, 100
 @>Text: \pgVery long ago, a man lived on the region of Peskan.
 @>Text: \pgThe man was curious about the Pokémon of the region, and went on a journey.
 @>Text: \pgHe met all sorts of Pokémon. In the mountains he met Slugma, a lava based fire type. It's very dangerous to touch, but are very friendly.
 @>Text: \pgIn the seas of Peskan he met Dratini, a very elegant yet powerful dragon type.
 @>Text: \pgBut his most important encounter, was a young Swinub he met during the winter.
 @>Text: \pgSwinub was very hot to the touch, a bad sign for any Ice type Pokémon.
 @>Text: \pgThe man was curious as to how a young Swinub could get hot. But then he realized, it was not just the young Swinub.
 @>Text: \pgPiloswine, Sneasel, Spheal, all the Ice type Pokémon were getting warm. Even the snow was starting to melt.
 @>Text: \pgApparently, during the 30 years that the man had journeyed the region. The rest of civilization was ruining the environment.
 @>Text: \pgBecause of civilization their pollution, earth was starting to warm up. Which was making all the Ice type Pokémon very sick.
 @>Text: \pgBut that is when the man met a very special Pokémon. A little yellow star Pokémon, Jirachi.
 @>Text: \pgJirachi granted the man one wish, any wish.
 @>Text: \pgThe man could have wished for his personal gain. He could have wished for immortality, money or fame.
 @>Text: \pgBut the selfless man his wish to Jirachi was to keep the habitat of the Ice types in a permanent state of winter, in order to heal the Ice types.
 @>Text: \pgBecause of his selfless act, the locals dubbed him the Great Anakiwa, and made him a legend.
 @>Text: \pgThe man, Jirachi and the Ice types lived happily ever after.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>Fade Out BGM: 2 sec.
 @>Text: \PN: \pgI suppose Anakiwa City was named after this "Great Anakiwa'.
 @>Restore BGM/BGS
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100
@>Text: You put the book back.
@>

Graphic: NPC 11

Autonomous Movement

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rCan I ask you something?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rI brought my Mawile and Sableye from the north here. But they cant seem to get along.
 @>Text: \rYou see, North Peskan Sableye and Mawile are natural enemies.
 @>Text: \rWould you mind taking one off my hands? You seem like a capable trainer.
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \rWhich one would you like to take care of?
  @>Show Choices: Sableye, Mawile
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Sableye]
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>Control Variables: [0029: battle outcome] = 1
   @>Script: vSST(9,"A")
   :       : vSST(10,"B")
   @>Script: pkmn = Pokemon.new(:SABLEYE,20)
   :       : pkmn.gender = 0
   :       : pkmn.item = GameData::Item.get(:SOOTHEBELL).id
   :       : GameData::Stat.each_main do |s|
   :       :      pkmn.iv[s.id_number] = 31
   :       : end
   :       : pkmn.givePokerus
   :       : pkmn.form = 1
   :       : pkmn.reset_moves
   :       : pbAddPokemon(pkmn,20)
   @>
  : When [Mawile]
   @>Control Variables: [0029: battle outcome] = 2
   @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
   @>Script: vSST(10,"A")
   :       : vSST(9,"B")
   @>Script: pkmn = Pokemon.new(:MAWILE,20)
   :       : pkmn.gender = 1
   :       : pkmn.item = GameData::Item.get(:SOOTHEBELL).id
   :       : GameData::Stat.each_main do |s|
   :       :      pkmn.iv[s.id_number] = 31
   :       : end
   :       : pkmn.givePokerus
   :       : pkmn.form = 1
   :       : pkmn.reset_moves
   :       : pbAddPokemon(pkmn,20)
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Script: vSST(5,"B")
  @>Text: \rPlease take good care of it!
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rThat's alright.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rThat's alright.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

  @>

  @>Control Variables: [0052] = 3

Event ID: 001
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Anakiwa City Pokémon Center!
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 8, 3
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 8, 3
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
:       : for i in 1..count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 8, 3
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 8, 3
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

Event ID: 002
Event Name: Move Relearner
(X,Y): (003,008)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 06

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: isTempSwitchOff?("A")
 @>Text: \bI'm the Pokémon Move Maniac.
 @>Text: \bI know every single move that Pokémon learn 
  :    : growing up.
 @>Text: \G\bFor 5000$, I'll teach a move to one of your 
  :    : Pokémon.
 @>Script: setTempSwitchOn("A")
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Gold 5000 or more
 @>Text: \G\bLet me guess, you want me to teach one of your 
  :    : Pokémon a move?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ChoosePokemon
  @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon needs tutoring?
  @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1, 3, proc{ |pkmn|
  :       :   pkmn.can_relearn_move?
  :       :   }, true
  :       : )
  @>Comment: If Game Variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player 
   :       : has canceled choosing a Pokémon.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>Text: \G\bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back with enough money.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).egg?
    @>Text: \bHunh? There isn't a single move that I can teach an 
     :    : Egg.
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
    @>Text: \bNo way, I don't want to go near a Shadow 
     :    : Pokémon..
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbGetPokemon(1).can_relearn_move?
    @>Text: \bSorry...
    @>Text: \bIt doesn't appear as if I have any move I can teach 
     :    : to your \v[3].
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: \bWhich move should I teach to your \v[3]?
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbRelearnMoveScreen(pbGetPokemon(1))
    @>Text: \G\bThere you go, that would be 5000$.
    @>Change Gold: - 5000
    @>Play SE: 'Mart buy item', 80, 100
    @>Text: \G\PN handed over 5000$ in exchange.
    @>Text: \G\bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back with enough money.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \G\bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back with enough money.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \G\bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back with enough money.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \G\bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back with enough money.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 @>Comment: Opens a screen for choosing a Pokémon. The index 
  :       : is stored in Game Variable 1, and the name in Game 
  :       : Variable 3.
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1, 3)
 @>Comment: If Game Variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player 
  :       : has canceled choosing a Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
  @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: Check for eggs.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).egg?
  @>Text: \bNow, now... That is merely an Egg!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: Check for Shadow Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
  @>Text: \bI wouldn't dare critique a Shadow Pokémon's name!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).foreign?($player)
  @>Text: \bHmmm... \v[3] it is!
  @>Text: \bThis is a magnificent nickname! It is impeccably 
   :    : beyond reproach!
  @>Text: \bYou'll do well to cherish your \v[3] now and 
   :    : beyond.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Text: \b\v[3], is it?\nThat is a decent nickname!
 @>Text: \bBut, would you like me to give it a nicer name?
 @>Text: \bHow about it?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \bAh, good. Then, what shall the new nickname be?
  @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
  :       : species = pkmn.speciesName
  :       : pbSet(4, species)
  :       : pbTextEntry("#{species}'s nickname?",
  :       :   0, Pokemon::MAX_NAME_SIZE, 5)
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(5) == pbGet(3) || (pbGet(5) == "" && pbGet(3) == pbGet(4))
   @>Comment: The Pokémon's nickname wasn't changed.
   @>Text: \bI see. You're right, there's no need to change this 
    :    : Pokémon's nickname.
   @>Text: \bIt already had a superb name!
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(5) == "" || pbGet(5) == pbGet(4)
    @>Comment: Resets the Pokémon's nickname to the species name.
    @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
    :       : pkmn.name = nil
    :       : pbSet(3, pkmn.name)
    @>Text: \bDone! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
     :    : as \v[3]!
    @>Text: \bIt looks no different from before, and yet, this is 
     :    : vastly superior!
    @>Text: \bHow fortunate for you!
    @>
   : Else
    @>Comment: Retrieves the Pokémon whose party index is stored in 
     :       : Game Variable 1, and changes its name to the name 
     :       : stored in Game Variable 5.
    @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
    :       : pkmn.name = pbGet(5)
    @>Text: \bDone! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
     :    : as \v[5]!
    @>Text: \bIt is a better name than before!\nHow fortunate for 
     :    : you!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rI brought my Mawile and Sableye from the north here. But they cant seem to get along.
 @>Text: \rYou see, North Peskan Sableye and Mawile are natural enemies.
 @>Text: \rWould you mind taking one off my hands? You seem like a capable trainer.
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \rWhich one would you like to take care of?
  @>Show Choices: Sableye, Mawile
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Sableye]
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>Control Variables: [0029: battle outcome] = 1
   @>Script: vSST(9,"A")
   :       : vSST(10,"B")

   :       : pkmn.gender = 0

   :       :      pkmn.iv[s.id_number] = 31
   :       : end
   :       : pkmn.givePokerus
   :       : pkmn.form = 1
   :       : pkmn.reset_moves
   :       : pbAddPokemon(pkmn,20)
   @>
  : When [Mawile]
   @>Control Variables: [0029: battle outcome] = 2
   @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
   @>Script: vSST(10,"A")
   :       : vSST(9,"B")
   @>Script: pkmn = Pokemon.new(:MAWILE,20)
   :       : pkmn.gender = 1
   :       : pkmn.item = GameData::Item.get(:SOOTHEBELL).id
   :       : GameData::Stat.each_main do |s|
   :       :      pkmn.iv[s.id_number] = 31

   :       : pkmn.givePokerus
   :       : pkmn.form = 1
   :       : pkmn.reset_moves
   :       : pbAddPokemon(pkmn,20)
   @>
  : Branch End

 : When [No]

   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>

   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \PN: \pgThere's a book in here called "The Slumbering Star". Should I read it?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Memorize BGM/BGS
 @>Fade Out BGM: 1 sec.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-20,-20,-20,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Play BGM: 'DPPT 040 Floaroma Town (Night)', 80, 100
 @>Text: \pgDating back to the stone age, there had been reports of a little star appearing when the Millenial Comet appears in the sky.
 @>Text: \pgThe little star had been dubbed The Slumbering Star. Because everytime it was spotted it appeared to go to sleep and turn into a crystal.
 @>Text: \pgEvery 1000 years there would be a report of a little yellow star-like pixie going about.
 @>Text: \pgEventually people figured out that it was the Wishmaker Pokémon called 'Jirachi'.
 @>Text: \pgJirachi is a Pokémon said to be able to grant wishes, though it can only teleport items.
 @>Text: \pgIt is also stated that Jirachi can reach its full potential, but somehow cannot achieve it.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>Fade Out BGM: 2 sec.
 @>Text: \PN: \pgThe book cuts off at this point...
 @>Restore BGM/BGS
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100
@>Text: You put the book back.
@>

 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)

  :              : $>Move Down

  :              : $>Move Right

  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Turn Up
 @>
: Else
 @>Set Event Location: [Jirachi],(011,012)
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)
 @>Set Move Route: [Jirachi]
  :              : $>Move Up
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Turn Up

  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Turn Up
 @>

@>Show Animation: [Rival], [Exclaim bubble]
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Text: \v[12]: \pogOh, you've found it! It's Jirachi's lair!
@>Set Move Route: [Rival]
 :              : $>Through ON
 :              : $>Move Down
 :              : $>Move Down
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Down
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Through OFF
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \v[12]: \pogIt's where Jirachi will sleep for the coming 1000 years.
@>Set Move Route: [Jirachi]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Text: Jirachi: \c[6]Jirachi knows this place very well!
@>Text: Jirachi: \c[6]Jirachi doesn't remember how long it has been here, over 9000 years!
@>Text: \v[12]: \pogWow! That's incredible, it has been intact for that long!
@>Set Move Route: [Jirachi]
 :              : $>Move Up
@>Text: Jirachi: \c[6]The wild Pokémon have been protecting Jirachi all those millennia.
@>Scroll Map: Up, 2, 4
@>Set Move Route: [Jirachi]
 :              : $>Jump: +0,-2
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Turn Down

 :              : $>Move Left
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Text: \v[12]: \pogLets have our goodbye with Jirachi at the statue. The statue means a lot to Jirachi, so it'd only be fair.
@>Set Move Route: [Rival]
 :              : $>Turn Up
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Up
@>Text: \v[12]: \pogIsn't that right Jirachi?

@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Text: Jirachi: \c[6]Jirachi agrees!
@>Set Move Route: [Rival]
 :              : $>Turn Left
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Text: \v[12]: \pogNow \PN, I heard they are holding a tournament at the Anakiwa Pre Gym today. I'm participating so I'm headed there in order to improve.

 :              : $>Turn Up

 :              : $>Turn Up

 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Turn Left

@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right

 @>Text: \xn[Dad]\bAnd I can see that in you. You've learnt a lot from him.
 @>

 @>Text: \xn[Dad]\bAnd I can see that in you. You've learnt a lot from her.
 @>

@>Text: \xn[Dad]\bYou should head on upstairs and grab your bag before you leave.
@>Text: \xn[Dad]\bMaybe Professor Apricot has got something for you!
@>Set Move Route: [Dad]
 :              : $>Move Down
 :              : $>Move Down
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 004
Event Name: EV004
(X,Y): (025,029)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_040_Poke_Fan_M

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0059] == OFF
 @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bHi there! My name is \rCameron The Photographer\b. I take pictures of trainers for them to remember their journey!
 @>Control Switches: [0059] = ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0078] == ON
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0031] >= 6
   @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bHi there, \PN, I see you're doing well!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bHello, trainer. I can take a picture for you.

Event ID: 008
Event Name: size(2,1)
(X,Y): (004,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \xn[\PN]\pgThere's a book in here called "The Pokérus Virus". Should I read it?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-20,-20,-20,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \pgPokérus, derived from Pokémon and Virus.
 @>Text: \pgIt is a mutualistic virus in the sense that it benefits both Pokémon and Virus.
 @>Text: \pgLittle is known about the origin or behavior of the virus, other than that it helps the growth of the infected Pokémon and that the virus only infects the Pokémon 
  :    : for a short amount of time before it is cured.
 @>Text: \pgThere is speculation, however, that an alien-lifeform brought the virus to us.
 @>Text: \pgBut, such a theory has never been proven.
 @>Text: \pgIf there is some lifeform who brought the virus to us, then it would not be unlikely that this 'alien' would have evolved beyond our understanding of life, as the 
  :    : virus itself benefits growth.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100
@>Text: You put the book back.
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Bismark City Pokémon Center!
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = OFF
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(22)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = ON
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 17 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
:       : for i in 1..count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 002
Event Name: EV002
(X,Y): (011,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_113_Mart_M

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0006: Defeated Gym 3] == ON
 @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
 :       :   :POKEBALL, :GREATBALL, :ULTRABALL,
 :       :   :POTION, :SUPERPOTION, :HYPERPOTION,
 :       :   :MAXPOTION, :FULLRESTORE, :REVIVE,
 :       :   :ANTIDOTE, :PARALYZEHEAL,
 :       :   :AWAKENING, :BURNHEAL, :ICEHEAL,
 :       :   :FULLHEAL, :ESCAPEROPE,

@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == ON
 @>Show Animation: This event, [Smile bubble]
 @>Text: \rThank you for taking care of Sentret.
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rHey! You're a trainer, right?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \rI was wondering, I caught this little Sentret a little while ago, but I am going to quit Pokémon training.
  @>Text: \rAnd Sentret here is super passionate about battling, so I would feel bad for it not to get a proper trainer.
  @>Text: \rWould you like to take care of Sentret for me?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Show Animation: [EV008], [Heart bubble]
   @>Set Move Route: [EV008]
    :              : $>Turn toward Player
   @>Text: \rYou would do that for Sentret and me? Thank you so much!
   @>Show Animation: [EV008], []
   @>Script: vSST(8)
   @>Script: pkmn = Pokemon.new(:SENTRET, 10)
   :       : pkmn.happiness = 240
   :       : pkmn.poke_ball = :HEALBALL
   :       : pkmn.iv[:HP] = 31; pkmn.iv[:ATTACK] = 31; pkmn.iv[:DEFENSE] = 31; pkmn.iv[:SPECIAL_ATTACK] = 31
   :       : pkmn.iv[:SPECIAL_DEFENSE] = 31; pkmn.iv[:SPEED] = 31
   :       : pkmn.gender = 1
   :       : pkmn.ability_index = 2
   :       : pkmn.moves.delete_at(1); pkmn.moves.delete_at(1); pkmn.moves.push(Pokemon::Move.new(:STOMP))
   :       : pkmn.moves.push(Pokemon::Move.new(:SANDTOMB)); pkmn.item = :LUCKYEGG
   :       : pkmn.nature = :JOLLY
   :       : pkmn.calc_stats
   :       : pbAddPokemon(pkmn,10)
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>Show Animation: This event, [Smile bubble]
   @>Text: \rThank you for taking care of Sentret.
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \rThat's unfortunate, but I get it. You seem like a competent trainer and Sentret are not that rare.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rOh, nevermind then.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
@>

Page #1
Conditions

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Rosewood City Pokémon Center!
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = OFF
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(22)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = ON
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 17 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
:       : for i in 1..count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 019
Event Name: Day Care Man
(X,Y): (028,016)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_075

Autonomous Movement
Type: Custom
Custom Move Route:
(Repeat Action)
$>Move Right
$>Move Left
$>Move Right
$>Move Left
$>Move Down
$>Move Up

Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.egg_generated?
 @>Text: \bAh, it's you!
 @>Text: \bWe were raising your Pokémon, and my goodness, 
  :    : were we surprised!
 @>Text: \bYour Pokémon was holding an Egg!
 @>Text: \bWe don't know how it got there, but your Pokémon 
  :    : had it.
 @>Text: \bYou do want it, don't you?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ReceiveEgg
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.party_full?
   @>Text: \bYou have no room for it right now... Come back 
    :    : when you've made room.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \me[Egg get]\PN received the Egg from the Day-Care 
   :    : Man.
  @>Text: \bYou take good care of it.
  @>Script: DayCare.collect_egg
  @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg = 0
  :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps = 0
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bI really will keep it. You do want this Egg, yes?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Jump to Label: ReceiveEgg
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \bWell all right then, I'll take it. Thank you.
   @>Text: \bThat is, I don't think we'll ever find another...
   @>Text: \bNo, no, I'm sure we'll find another one. I'm definitely 
    :    : sure of it!
   @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg = 0
   :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps = 0
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 0
  @>Text: \bI'm the Day-Care Man.
  @>Text: \bI help take care of the precious Pokémon of 
   :    : trainers.
  @>Text: \bAny Pokémon you'd like to have raised you can 
   :    : leave in my wife's care.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 1
  @>Script: DayCare.get_details(-1, 3, -1)
  @>Text: \bAh, it's you!\nGood to see you!
  @>Text: \bYour \v[3] is doing just fine.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 2
  @>Script: DayCare.get_details(0, 3, -1)
  :       : DayCare.get_details(1, 4, -1)
  :       : DayCare.get_compatibility(5)
  @>Text: \bAh, it's you!\nGood to see you!
  @>Text: \bYour \v[3] and \v[4] are doing just fine.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 0
   @>Text: \bThe two play with other Pokémon rather than with 
    :    : each other...
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 1
   @>Text: \bThe two don't seem to like each other much.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 2
   @>Text: \bThe two seem to get along.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 3
   @>Text: \bThe two seem to get along very well.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

: Else

  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0031] >= 6
   @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bHi there, \PN, I see you're doing well!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bHello, trainer. I can take a picture for you.
  @>

@>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bCare for a picture?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Player's Map X

 @>Text: \pgThis caused a great disturbance in both Space and Time.
 @>Text: \pgLuckily, for Palkia, it was able to contain it.
 @>Text: \pgDialga was not so lucky, and, as time rippled and bent through the universe, a new creature was born.
 @>Text: \pgA Pokémon called 'Celebi'.
 @>Text: \pgBorn from the disturbance of time, it gained the ability to hop across it.
 @>Text: \pgIt is said that ever since that day, Dialga has tried its best to get Celebi in order to set time right again.

 @>Text: \pgIt is unknown whether he was successful, but his accomplices have yet to give any information on the topic.

  @>Label: TakeBack
  @>Text: \rDo you want your Pokémon back?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Label: TakeBackChosen
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.party_full?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon team is full. Make room, then come 
     :    : see me.
    @>Jump to Label: End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: DayCare.choose(
   :       :   _I("Which one do you want back?"),
   :       :   1
   :       : )
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Text: \rVery good. Come again.
    @>Jump to Label: End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: DayCare.get_details(pbGet(1), 3, 4)
   @>Text: \G\rIf you want your \v[3] back, it will cost $\v[4].
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = Gold
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] < Variable [0004: Temp Move Name]
     @>Text: \G\rYou don't have enough money...
     @>Jump to Label: End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Change Gold: - Variable [0004: Temp Move Name]
    @>Script: DayCare.withdraw(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: \G\rExcellent\nHere's your Pokémon.
    @>Text: \PN took \v[3] back from the Day-Care Lady.
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 1
     @>Text: \rDo you want to take back the other one, too?
     @>Show Choices: Yes, No
     (When Cancel: Choice 2)
     : When [Yes]
      @>Jump to Label: TakeBackChosen
      @>
     : When [No]
      @>Text: \rVery good. Come again.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: \rVery good. Come again.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Text: \rVery good. Come again.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \rVery good. Come again.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: End
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0083] == OFF
 @>Text: \rHere, take this Pokémon egg.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGenerateEgg(:PICHU)
  @>Text: \me[Egg get]\PN received an Egg from the Day-Care Lady.
  @>Text: \rYou take good care of it.
  @>Control Switches: [0083] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rYou have no room for it right now... Come back when you've made room.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.refresh
@>

Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Selago Town Pokémon Center!
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = OFF
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(22)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = ON
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 17 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
:       : for i in 1..count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0

 : Branch End

 @>Script: vCry(:CELEBI)
 @>Text: \xn[Celebi]\c[3]Celebi will be waiting.

Event ID: 006
Event Name: size(2,1)
(X,Y): (008,005)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \xn[\PN]\pgThere's a book in here called "Pokémon and their rarities". Should I read it?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-20,-20,-20,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \pgPokémon, as many know, differ in rarity in the wild.
 @>Text: \pgYou're not going to find a Magcargo type in the middle of the sea, nor are you going to find a Politoed in a volcano.
 @>Text: \pgBut there are Pokémon that appear in low frequencies in uncommon places.
 @>Text: \pgSuch Pokémon we call 'Rare Pokémon'.
 @>Text: \pgBut they are not just bound by their species. Pokémon of all kinds can be rare.
 @>Text: \pgThese rarities may include things such as shininess, hidden abilities, unique formes or even in some cases a specific gender.
 @>Text: \pgPokémon such as Combee are frequently male, making a female one fairly rare, and this is enhanced by the fact that only female Combee can evolve into 
  :    : Vespiquen.
 @>Text: \pgUnique formes in the other hand depend on the species.
 @>Text: \pgSuch as the Buizel in Peskan, which is really rare in other parts of the world, thus making Peskan Buizel very unique.
 @>Text: \pgShinies on the other hand has been reported to appear in every species of Pokémon, shininess only affects the appearance of the Pokémon.
 @>Text: \pgBut because they appear super infrequently, roughly 0.64%, they are often sought after by so called 'Shiny Hunters'.
 @>Text: \pgAnother case of something that appears in all reported species are 'Hidden Abilities'.
 @>Text: \pgThough not confirmed, most recorded species of Pokémon have been reported to have a chance of appearing with a hidden ability.
 @>Text: \pgIn fact it is estimated to appear in roughly 1/10 wild Pokémon.
 @>Text: \pgHidden Abilities can range from a Bidoof with Moody, to more intense abilities like Shuckle with Contrast.
 @>Text: \pgOne of the most well known 'Rarest Pokémon' would be the Pokémon Spinda.
 @>Text: \pgSpecifically one that has its hidden ability, has a specific pattern and also is shiny.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \xn[\PN]\pgFinding a rare Pokémon like this would be super cool!
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100
@>Text: You put the book back.
@>

 @>Text: \pgDon't: pet any other trainers their Pokémon, as this could lead to jelousy in your own Pokémon, when they smell another trainer their Pokémon's scent on you.

 @>Text: \pgThe man was curious about the Pokémon of the region, and went on a journey.
 @>Text: \pgHe met all sorts of Pokémon. In the mountains he met Slugma, a lava based fire type. It's very dangerous to touch, but are very friendly.
 @>Text: \pgIn the seas of Peskan he met Dratini, a very elegant yet powerful dragon type.
 @>Text: \pgBut his most important encounter, was a young Swinub he met during the winter.
 @>Text: \pgSwinub was very hot to the touch, a bad sign for any Ice type Pokémon.
 @>Text: \pgThe man was curious as to how a young Swinub could get hot. But then he realized, it was not just the young Swinub.
 @>Text: \pgPiloswine, Sneasel, Spheal, all the Ice type Pokémon were getting warm. Even the snow was starting to melt.
 @>Text: \pgApparently, during the 30 years that the man had journeyed the region. The rest of civilization was ruining the environment.
 @>Text: \pgBecause of civilization their pollution, earth was starting to warm up. Which was making all the Ice type Pokémon very sick.
 @>Text: \pgBut that is when the man met a very special Pokémon. A little yellow star Pokémon, Jirachi.
 @>Text: \pgJirachi granted the man one wish, any wish.
 @>Text: \pgThe man could have wished for his personal gain. He could have wished for immortality, money or fame.
 @>Text: \pgBut the selfless man his wish to Jirachi was to keep the habitat of the Ice types in a permanent state of winter, in order to heal the Ice types.
 @>Text: \pgBecause of his selfless act, the locals dubbed him the Great Anakiwa, and made him a legend.
 @>Text: \pgThe man, Jirachi and the Ice types lived happily ever after.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \xn[\PN]\pgI suppose Anakiwa City was named after this "Great Anakiwa'.
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100

Event ID: 005
Event Name: size(2,1)
(X,Y): (008,005)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \xn[\PN]\pgThere's a book in here called "Peskan on, reintroducing fossil species to the wild". Should I read it?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-20,-20,-20,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \pgThe Peskan region is far more advanced than other regions in how they support their wildlife and ecosystems.
 @>Text: \pgA great example would be the reintroduction of revived fossil species into the wild.
 @>Text: \pgThough they had to be careful with it, and very selective, they have been able to let wild Shieldon and Cranidos back into the ecosystem of north-east Peskan.
 @>Text: \pgThis had been attempted before in a protected area in the Hoenn region, but to no avail.
 @>Text: \pgThe Peskan region appears to be the first and only region so far to have successfully reintroduced an extinct species to the wild.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100
@>Text: You put the book back.
@>

@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-20,-20,-20,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \pgBecause of the Peskan Celebi Festival, a lot of people got confused.
 @>Text: \pgSince Celebi was first sighted in the Johto Area, people were to believe that Celebi only lived there.
 @>Text: \pgA lot of confusion arose in the people of Johto, as they wondered if it was right to give Celebi a mythical status when there were multiple of them.
 @>Text: \pgSome theorized that Celebi was merely teleporting to Peskan during the festival, others even speculized traveling through time.
 @>Text: \pgBut it was never proven whether Celebi originates from Johto or Peskan.
 @>Text: \pgThere may just also be multiple Celebi.
 @>Text: \pgA popular paper released by Samuel O. states that he met thousands of individual Celebi while exploring his local forest.
 @>Text: \pgHe says he spent his time drawing all the amazing things he saw during his time with the Celebi.
 @>Text: \pgIncluded with the sketches are 'predictions' of future inventions, though none have yet been proven to be true.
 @>Text: \pgThere are many who believe his story.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \xn[\PN]\pgInteresting...
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100
@>Text: You put the book back.

Event ID: 007
Event Name: size(2,1)
(X,Y): (002,005)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \xn[\PN]\pgThere's a book in here called "Do's and Don'ts with Pokémon". Should I read it?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-20,-20,-20,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \pgDo: give Pokémon a lot of attention. A lot of Pokémon have separation anxiety.
 @>Text: \pgDon't: stare at wild Pokémon, this could seem like a challenge to them and you could get attacked by them.
 @>Text: \pgDo: leave mother Pokémon alone, as they are very protective of their babies, and will attack if you seem like a threat.
 @>Text: \pgDon't: feed wild Pokémon. As this could lead into an investation of wild Pokémon, expecting to be fed.
 @>Text: \pgDo: groom your furry Pokémon. As their fur is very important to all furry Pokémon. It's kind of a part of their pride.
 @>Text: \pgDon't: pet any other trainers their Pokémon, as this could lead to jelousy in your own Pokémon, when they smell another trainer their Pokémon's scent on you.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \xn[\PN]\pgThat could come in handy maybe.
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100
@>Text: You put the book back.
@>

Map ID: 233
Map Name: Sundance City Poké Center

Width: 20, Height: 15
Auto-Change BGM: DPPT 019 Pokemon Center (Night)

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Sundance City Pokémon Center!
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = OFF
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(22)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = ON
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 17 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
:       : for i in 1..count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

Event ID: 002

(X,Y): (011,004)

Autonomous Movement

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0006: Defeated Gym 3] == ON
 @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
 :       :   :POKEBALL, :GREATBALL, :ULTRABALL,
 :       :   :POTION, :SUPERPOTION, :HYPERPOTION,
 :       :   :MAXPOTION, :FULLRESTORE, :REVIVE,
 :       :   :ANTIDOTE, :PARALYZEHEAL,
 :       :   :AWAKENING, :BURNHEAL, :ICEHEAL,
 :       :   :FULLHEAL, :ESCAPEROPE,
 :       :   :ETHER, :MAXETHER, :ELIXIR, :MAXELIXIR,

 :       :   :REPEL, :SUPERREPEL, :MAXREPEL,
 :       :   :POKETOY
 :       : ])
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0005: Defeated Gym 2] == ON
  @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
  :       :   :POKEBALL, :GREATBALL, :ULTRABALL,
  :       :   :POTION, :SUPERPOTION, :HYPERPOTION,
  :       :   :ANTIDOTE, :PARALYZEHEAL,
  :       :   :AWAKENING, :BURNHEAL, :ICEHEAL,
  :       :   :FULLHEAL, :ESCAPEROPE,
  :       :   :ETHER, :ELIXIR,
  :       :   :QUICKBALL, :TIMERBALL,
  :       :   :REPEL, :SUPERREPEL, :MAXREPEL
  :       : ])
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0004: Defeated Gym 1] == ON
   @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
   :       :   :POKEBALL, :GREATBALL,
   :       :   :POTION, :SUPERPOTION,
   :       :   :ANTIDOTE, :PARALYZEHEAL,
   :       :   :AWAKENING, :BURNHEAL, :ICEHEAL,
   :       :   :ESCAPEROPE,
   :       :   :ETHER, :ELIXIR,
   :       :   :REPEL, :SUPERREPEL
   :       : ])
   @>
  : Else
   @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
   :       :   :POKEBALL, :POTION,
   :       :   :ANTIDOTE, :PARALYZEHEAL,

   :       :   :ESCAPEROPE, :REPEL
   :       : ])
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 007
Event Name: EV007
(X,Y): (012,008)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_017_Roughneck

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == ON
 @>Text: \bThanks for taking Finneon off my back.
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \bYou, you're a trainer, right?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \bSo, last night I was with my bros, but then when we all called it a night, I suddenly found this shiny Finneon.
  @>Text: \bIt's a shiny, so I had to catch it, right?
  @>Text: \bWhere I am getting at is, Finneon's shiny color is pink.
  @>Text: \bI am not trying to be controversial here, I don't think there's a problem with it at all.
  @>Text: \bBut the bros might not appreciate a bro having a pink Pokémon.
  @>Text: \bWould you take Finneon from me?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Set Move Route: [EV008]
    :              : $>Turn toward Player
   @>Text: \bThanks, here ya go!
   @>Show Animation: [EV008], []
   @>Script: vSST(8)
   @>Script: pkmn = Pokemon.new(:FINNEON, 15)
   :       : pkmn.happiness = 240; pkmn.poke_ball = :LUREBALL
   :       : pkmn.iv[:HP] = 31; pkmn.iv[:ATTACK] = 31; pkmn.iv[:DEFENSE] = 31; pkmn.iv[:SPECIAL_ATTACK] = 31
   :       : pkmn.iv[:SPECIAL_DEFENSE] = 31; pkmn.iv[:SPEED] = 31
   :       : pkmn.gender = 1
   :       : pkmn.ability_index = 2
   :       : pkmn.moves.delete_at(1); pkmn.moves.delete_at(1); pkmn.moves.push(Pokemon::Move.new(:AQUAJET))
   :       : pkmn.moves.push(Pokemon::Move.new(:HEX)); pkmn.item = :RARECANDY
   :       : pkmn.nature = :BOLD
   :       : pkmn.shiny = true
   :       : pkmn.calc_stats
   :       : pbAddPokemon(pkmn,10)
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>Show Animation: This event, [Smile bubble]
   @>Text: \bThanks for taking Finneon off my back.
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \bWow, really? You would say no to a shiny?
   @>Text: \bMaybe you're like the bros and don't like pink, I get it.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bOh, nevermind then.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>

  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Up
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Change Transparent Flag: Normal
 @>Set Move Route: Player
  :              : $>Through ON
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Through OFF
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Set Move Route: This event
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Turn Right
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>

@>Script: setTempSwitchOn("A")
