#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 017
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (012,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Sambucha Casino!
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = OFF
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Through ON
  :              : $>Move Up
  :              : $>Move Left
  :              : $>Move Left
  :              : $>Move Up
  :              : $>Change Opacity: 0
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @10
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @10
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Change Opacity: 255
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Through OFF
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = ON
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 17 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 018
Event Name: Coin Case giver
(X,Y): (008,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_112

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \G\CN\rWelcome to the Sambucha Casino!
@>Conditional Branch: Script: !$bag.has?(:COINCASE)
 @>Text: \G\CN\rWould you like to buy some game chips?
 @>Text: \rOh, you don't have a Chip Case? Here you go!
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbReceiveItem(:COINCASE)
  @>Text: \rYou can exchange your chips for fabulous prizes from my colleague, or try your luck at our Prize Wheel!
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rSeems like you don't have any room for it. Come back when you do.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Label: Start menu
 @>Text: \G\CN\rWould you like to buy some game chips?
 @>Show Choices: 50 chips [$1,000], 100 chips [$2,000], 500 chips [$10,000], Exit
 (When Cancel: Choice 4)
 : When [50 chips [$1,000]]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.coins + 50 >= Settings::MAX_COINS
   @>Text: \G\CN\rWhoops!\nYour Chip Case is full.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 999 or less
    @>Text: \G\CN\rYou can't afford the chips.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Change Gold: - 1000
    @>Script: $player.coins += 50
    @>Text: \G\CN\rThank you\nHere are your chips!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [100 chips [$2,000]]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.coins + 100 >= Settings::MAX_COINS
   @>Text: \G\CN\rWhoops!\nYour Chip Case is full.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 1999 or less
    @>Text: \G\CN\rYou can't afford the chips.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Change Gold: - 10000
    @>Script: $player.coins += 200
    @>Text: \G\CN\rThank you\nHere are your chips!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [500 chips [$10,000]]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.coins + 500 >= Settings::MAX_COINS
   @>Text: \G\CN\rWhoops!\nYour Chip Case is full.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 9999 or less
    @>Text: \G\CN\rYou can't afford the chips.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Change Gold: - 10000
    @>Script: $player.coins += 500
    @>Text: \G\CN\rThank you\nHere are your chips!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Exit]
  @>Text: \G\CN\rNo?\nPlease come play sometime!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Jump to Label: Start menu
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 019
Event Name: EV019
(X,Y): (010,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_111

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \bWelcome to the Sambucha Casino!
@>Conditional Branch: Script: !$bag.has?(:COINCASE)
 @>Text: \bWould you like to exchange your chips for some prizes?
 @>Text: \bHuh, you don't have a Chip Case? Talk to my colleague to get one!
 @>
: Else
 @>Label: start
 @>Text: \CN\bWould you like to exchange your chips for some prizes?
 @>Show Choices: Items, Pokémon, TMs, Cancel
 (When Cancel: Choice 4)
 : When [Items]
  @>Script: pbPokemonCoinStore([
  :       : :FOCUSBAND,:SCOPELENS,:HPUP,:PPUP,
  :       : :RAZORCLAW,:RAZORFANG,:SHELLBELL,:WHITEHERB,
  :       : :POWERHERB,:BRIGHTPOWDER,:PPMAX,:FLAMEORB,
  :       : :TOXICORB,:MUSCLEBAND,:CHOICESCARF,:CHOICESPECS,
  :       : :CHOICEBAND,:FOCUSSASH,:LIFEORB,:WAXCANDLE,:RARECANDY],[
  :       : 500,500,500,500,
  :       : 1000,1000,1500,1500,
  :       : 1500,1500,1500,2000,
  :       : 2000,2000,2500,2500,
  :       : 2500,3500,3500,3500,3500])
  @>
 : When [Pokémon]
  @>Label: pokemon
  @>Text: \CN\bWhat would you like to purchase?\ch[1,7,Pichu - 200 chips,Wooper - 500 chips,Kirlia - 1000 chips,Lapras - 
   :    : 2000 chips,Rotom - 5000 chips,Dratini - 9999 chips,No thanks]
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>Jump to Label: start
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Script: item = [:PICHU, :WOOPER_1,
  :       :         :KIRLIA, :LAPRAS,
  :       :         :ROTOM, :DRATINI, nil][pbGet(1)]
  :       : price = [200, 500, 1000, 2000, 5000, 9999][pbGet(1)]
  :       : lv = [5, 15, 15, 15, 15, 15, 0][pbGet(1)]
  @>Script: pbSet(1, item)
  :       : pbSet(2, price)
  :       : if item
  :       :   data = GameData::Species.get(item)
  :       :   pbSet(3, data.name)
  :       : end
  :       : pbSet(4, lv)
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] > 0
   @>Text: \CN\bSo you want the \r\v[3]\b?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(2) > $player.coins
     @>Text: \CN\bYou don't have enough chips for that, I'm afraid!
     @>Jump to Label: pokemon
     @>
    : Else
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbAddPokemon(pbGet(1), pbGet(4))
      @>Script: $player.coins -= pbGet(2)
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Jump to Label: pokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [TMs]
  @>Script: pbPokemonCoinStore([
  :       :   :TM04, :TM06,
  :       :   :TM03, :TM17,
  :       :   :TM19, :TM20,
  :       :   :TM10, :TM11],[
  :       :    1000,1000,
  :       :    1500,1500,
  :       :    1500,1500,
  :       :    2500,2500])
  @>
 : When [Cancel]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch B == ON
 @>Text: \xn[Kuni]\rYou should definitely visit Johto sometime. There's some really strong trainers back in Johto!
 @>Exit Event Processing
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPANTSMission(:PANTS5).active?
 @>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == OFF
  @>Fade Out BGM: 1 sec.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-10,-10,-10,0), @20
  @>Text: \rOh! You're asking about the \bLegendary Beasts \rfrom Johto?
  @>Scroll Map: Up, 1, 2
  @>Play BGM: 'HGSS 161 Ecruteak Dance Theater', 100, 100
  @>Text: \rWell, they appeared from the Burned Tower in Ecruteak City after Ho-oh saved three helpless Pokémon from the burning tower.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Turn Up
  @>Text: \rUs Kimono Girls serve both Ho-oh and Lugia, thus we are also connected to the Legendary Beasts.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Turn Right
  @>Text: \rIf you'd like me to, I could summon them here for you. But only if you can beat me in a traditional Double Battle.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Turn Down
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
  @>Scroll Map: Down, 1, 2
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Play BGM: 'HGSS 161 Ecruteak Dance Theater', 100, 100
 @>Text: \rAre you up for a double battle?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: if $player.able_pokemon_count>1
  :       :   setBattleRule("2v2")
  :       : else
  :       :   setBattleRule("1v2")
  :       : end
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattleCore([:KIMONOGIRL,"Kuni",0])==1
   @>Text: \xn[Kuni]\rYour battle style reminds me of someone back in Johto.
   @>Text: \xn[Kuni]\rIn any case, I can perform the ritual that will summon the Legendary beasts for you.
   @>Text: \xn[Kuni]\rFollow me.
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @5
   @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Transfer Player:[224: Sundance City], (011,043), Up, No Fade
   @>Fade Out BGM: 1 sec.
   @>Script: vSST(32)
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @5
   @>Wait: 5 frame(s)
   @>Text: \xn[Kuni]\rWell then...
   @>Scroll Map: Up, 2, 2
   @>Text: \xn[Kuni]\rThis dance is called \bThe Dance of Ecruteak \rand can even summon the legendary birds themselves.
   @>Play BGM: 'HGSS 185 The Dance of Ecruteak', 100, 100
   @>Script: ecruteakDance(32)
   @>Fade Out BGM: 1 sec.
   @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
   @>Play ME: 'HGSS 186 Ho-oh Appears!', 100, 100
   @>Scroll Map: Down, 1, 2
   @>Screen Flash: (255,255,255,255), @10
   @>Script: vSST(33)
   @>Set Move Route: Player
    :              : $>Turn Left
   @>Set Move Route: [kuni]
    :              : $>Turn Left
   @>Wait: 30 frame(s)
   @>Script: vCry(:RAIKOU)
   @>Wait: 40 frame(s)
   @>Screen Flash: (255,255,255,255), @10
   @>Script: vSST(34)
   @>Set Move Route: Player
    :              : $>Turn Right
   @>Set Move Route: [kuni]
    :              : $>Turn Right
   @>Wait: 30 frame(s)
   @>Script: vCry(:ENTEI)
   @>Wait: 40 frame(s)
   @>Screen Flash: (255,255,255,255), @10
   @>Script: vSST(35)
   @>Set Move Route: Player
    :              : $>Turn Up
   @>Set Move Route: [kuni]
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait: 30 frame(s)
   @>Script: vCry(:SUICUNE)
   @>Wait: 40 frame(s)
   @>Screen Flash: (255,255,255,255), @10
   @>Script: vSSF(33)
   :       : vSSF(34)
   :       : vSSF(35)
   @>Set Move Route: [kuni]
    :              : $>Move Down
   @>Scroll Map: Down, 1, 2
   @>Text: \xn[Kuni]\rThey have arrived and started roaming. Check your map and you will see where they are.
   @>Text: \xn[Kuni]\rWhen they are near, they will let themselves be heard.
   @>Set Move Route: [kuni]
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Turn Right
    :              : $>Turn Up
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Screen Flash: (255,255,255,255), @10
   @>Script: vSSF(32)
   @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
   @>Control Switches: [0055: Entei roaming] = ON
   @>Script: pbRoamPokemon
   :       : for i in 0..2; $PokemonGlobal.roamPosition[i] = nil; end
   :       : pbRoamPokemon
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rI appreciate your honesty, but I will not summon those beasts without a battle.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Fade Out BGM: 1 sec.
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Script: $game_map.autoplay
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rI moved here from Johto, this village really is just relaxing to the core.
 @>Text: \rUnfortunately, I'm now very far away from my friends and family back in Ecruteak City...
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 001
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Scarlet Village Pokémon Center!
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = OFF
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(22)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = ON
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 17 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
:       : for i in 1..count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

Event ID: 011
Event Name: size(2,1)
(X,Y): (003,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \xn[\PN]\pgThere's a book in here called "Pokémon and their rarities". Should I read it?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-20,-20,-20,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \pgPokémon, as many know, differ in rarity in the wild.
 @>Text: \pgYou're not going to find a Magcargo type in the middle of the sea, nor are you going to find a Politoed in a volcano.
 @>Text: \pgBut there are Pokémon that appear in low frequencies in uncommon places.
 @>Text: \pgSuch Pokémon we call 'Rare Pokémon'.
 @>Text: \pgBut they are not just bound by their species. Pokémon of all kinds can be rare.
 @>Text: \pgThese rarities may include things such as shininess, hidden abilities, unique formes or even in some cases a specific gender.
 @>Text: \pgPokémon such as Combee are frequently male, making a female one fairly rare, and this is enhanced by the fact that only female Combee can evolve into 
  :    : Vespiquen.
 @>Text: \pgUnique formes in the other hand depend on the species.
 @>Text: \pgSuch as the Buizel in Peskan, which is really rare in other parts of the world, thus making Peskan Buizel very unique.
 @>Text: \pgShinies on the other hand has been reported to appear in every species of Pokémon, shininess only affects the appearance of the Pokémon.
 @>Text: \pgBut because they appear super infrequently, roughly 0.64%, they are often sought after by so called 'Shiny Hunters'.
 @>Text: \pgAnother case of something that appears in all reported species are 'Hidden Abilities'.
 @>Text: \pgThough not confirmed, most recorded species of Pokémon have been reported to have a chance of appearing with a hidden ability.
 @>Text: \pgIn fact it is estimated to appear in roughly 1/10 wild Pokémon.
 @>Text: \pgHidden Abilities can range from a Bidoof with Moody, to more intense abilities like Shuckle with Contrast.
 @>Text: \pgOne of the most well known 'Rarest Pokémon' would be the Pokémon Spinda.
 @>Text: \pgSpecifically one that has its hidden ability, has a specific pattern and also is shiny.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \xn[\PN]\pgFinding a rare Pokémon like this would be super cool!
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100
@>Text: You put the book back.
@>

Event ID: 028
Event Name: EV028
(X,Y): (029,055)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_040_Poke_Fan_M

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0059] == OFF
 @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bHi there! My name is \rCameron The Photographer\b. I take pictures of trainers for them to remember their journey!
 @>Control Switches: [0059] = ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0078] == ON
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0031] >= 6
   @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bHi there, \PN, I see you're doing well!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bHello, trainer. I can take a picture for you.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bCare for a picture?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Player's Map X
 @>Control Variables: [0002: Temp Move Choice] = Player's Map Y
 @>Script: pbSet(3,$game_player.direction)
 @>Control Variables: [0004: Temp Move Name] = Map ID
 @>Control Switches: [0077: Alpha Pincross] = ON
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Up
 @>Set Move Route: Player
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0078] == ON
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0031] >= 6
   @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bCome on! Let all your Pokémon join in on the picture!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bMaybe get your Pokémon, too...
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @10
 @>Wait: 12 frame(s)
 @>Script: addParty([29,30,31,32,33,34])
 @>Scroll Map: Right, 1, 6
 @>Wait: 6 frame(s)
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Change Opacity: 0
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @8
 @>Wait: 12 frame(s)
 @>Script: pbCameraCapture
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0078] == ON
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0031] >= 6
   @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bNow, smile!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bNow, smile!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Play SE: 'Battle catch click', 80, 100
 @>Screen Flash: (255,255,255,255), @5
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Text: \w[memo]The image has been saved to /Screenshots/Taken By Cameron/
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @10
 @>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 @>Script: resetParty([29,30,31,32,33,34])
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Change Opacity: 255
 @>Transfer Player:Variable [0004][0001][0002], No Fade
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn toward Player
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.move_route([PBMoveRoute::Left],true)
 @>Script: $game_player.direction = pbGet(3)
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @8
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0078] == ON
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0031] == 0
   @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bPicture was taken.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0031] <= 5
    @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bThat turned out alright.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0031] == 9
   @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bI simply love this image, straight up perfection. Wow!
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0031] >= 6
    @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bWow! What a beautiful picture! It really shows your dedication.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bWow! What a beautiful picture! It really shows your dedication.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0078] == OFF
  @>Text: \xn[Cameron]\bAlso, if you might, could you please leave a rating on how satisfied you were? (9 = most satisfaction)
  @>Input Number: [0031], 1 digit(s)
  @>Control Switches: [0078] = ON
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0031] == 0
   @>Show Animation: This event, [Exclaim bubble]

   @>

   @>

Event ID: 001
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (008,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Wakaiwa City Pokémon Center!
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = OFF
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(22)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = ON
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 17 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
:       : for i in 1..count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

 :       :   :POKEBALL, :GREATBALL, :ULTRABALL,
 :       :   :POTION, :SUPERPOTION, :HYPERPOTION,

 :       : ])
 @>

  :       :   :POKEBALL, :GREATBALL, :ULTRABALL,

  @>
 : Else

   @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
   :       :   :POKEBALL, :GREATBALL,
   :       :   :POTION, :SUPERPOTION,

  : Else

   :       :   :POKEBALL, :POTION,

Event ID: 004
Event Name: Controls
(X,Y): (001,003)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Ask the player which the floor they want to go to, 
 :       : and store the difference between it and the current 
 :       : floor in Game Variable 11.
 :       : This difference determines which wall animation is 
 :       : played, as well as how many times it is played.
@>Script: numfloors = 4
@>Script: current_floor = numfloors - pbGet(10)
:       : new_floor = pbMessage(
:       :    _I("Which floor do you want?"),
:       :    [_I("4F"),_I("3F"),
:       :    _I("2F"),_I("1F"),_I("Exit")],
:       :    numfloors + 1, nil, current_floor)
:       : pbSet(11, numfloors - new_floor)
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0011: Elevator new floor] == 0
 @>Comment: Choice was cancelled or chose the current floor.
 @>
: Else
 @>Label: Start
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0011: Elevator new floor] > Variable [0010: Elevator current floor]
  @>Comment: Go up.
  @>Screen Shake: 4, 9, @12
  @>Set Move Route: [Wall left]
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Set Move Route: [Wall middle]
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Set Move Route: [Wall right]
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Control Variables: [0010: Elevator current floor] += 1
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0011: Elevator new floor] < Variable [0010: Elevator current floor]
  @>Comment: Go down.
  @>Screen Shake: 4, 9, @12
  @>Set Move Route: [Wall left]
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Set Move Route: [Wall middle]
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Set Move Route: [Wall right]
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Control Variables: [0010: Elevator current floor] -= 1
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 005
Event Name: Exit
(X,Y): (003,008)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Play SE: 'Door exit', 80, 100
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0010: Elevator current floor] == 4
 @>Transfer Player:[244: Sambucha Town], (007,005), No Fade
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0010: Elevator current floor] == 3
  @>Transfer Player:[243: Sambucha Town], (007,005), No Fade
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0010: Elevator current floor] == 2
   @>Transfer Player:[242: Sambucha Town], (007,005), No Fade
   @>
  : Else
   @>Transfer Player:[241: Sambucha Town], (007,005), No Fade
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 007
Event Name: 
(X,Y): (026,010)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: [LW2] Badge Guy

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == ON
 @>Text: \xn[Zaffre]\bThat was a great battle!
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \xn[Zaffre]\bHey there, I am Zaffre from the dev team.
 @>Text: \xn[Zaffre]\bI made most of the overworlds, doors, provided lots of amazing resources and most importantly, a lot of bug fixes.
 @>Text: \xn[Zaffre]\bSome of my friends also call me by my real name, Badge Guy.
 @>Text: \xn[Zaffre]\bThough Voltseon sometimes calls me Background for some reason...
 @>Text: \xn[Zaffre]\bAnyways, if you are down, we can have a battle?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \xn[Zaffre]\bAlright awesome.
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: TrainerBattle.start(:POKEMONTRAINER_BadgeGuy, "Zaffre")
   @>Script: $DiscordRPC.details = "Chilling with the Devs"
   :       : $DiscordRPC.state = "Location: Developer Room"
   :       : $DiscordRPC.update
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn toward Player
   @>Text: \xn[Zaffre]\bThat was a great battle!
   @>Script: pbUnlockTheme(9)
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \xn[Zaffre]\bThat is okay, just let me know if you are up for it!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End

Page #1
Conditions

Graphic: NPC_111

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This event can notice the player at a distance even 
 :       : though an impassable tile (the desk) is in the way. 
 :       : This is because this event's name contains the text 
 :       : "Counter(X)", where "X" is the number of tiles in front 
 :       : of itself that it can see.
@>Text: \bWelcome to the Safari Zone!
@>Set Move Route: Player
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
@>Text: \G\bFor just $500, you can play the Safari Game.
@>Text: \G\bYou can roam the wide-open safari and catch 
 :    : what you like.
@>Text: \G\bWould you like to play?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbBoxesFull?
  @>Text: \G\bSorry, your PC boxes are full.
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Move Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Gold 499 or less
  @>Text: \G\bOops!\nNot enough money!
  @>Text: \G\bCome again.
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Move Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\bThat'll be $500, please!
  @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 80, 100
  @>Change Gold: - 500
  @>Text: \G\bWe only use a special kind of Poké Ball here.
  @>Text: \G\PN received 30 Safari Balls from the attendant.
   :    : \me[Item get]\wtnp[40]
  @>Text: \G\bWe'll call you on the PA when you run out of time 
   :    : or Safari Balls.
  @>Text: \G\bWell, I wish you the best of luck!
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Through ON
   :              : $>Move Right
   :              : $>Move Right
   :              : $>Move Right
   :              : $>Move Up
   :              : $>Move Up
   :              : $>Move Up
   :              : $>Move Up
   :              : $>Move Up
   :              : $>Through OFF
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Script: pbSafariState.pbStart(30)
  @>Play SE: 'Door exit', 80, 100
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Change Opacity: 255
  @>Transfer Player:[238: ???], (014,024), Up, No Fade
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \G\bOkay.\nPlease come again!
 @>Set Move Route: Player
  :              : $>Move Left
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Autonomous Movement

Options Enabled

@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-20,-20,-20,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \pgThe Peskan region is far more advanced than other regions in how they support their wildlife and ecosystems.
 @>Text: \pgFor example, the enclosed wild areas in Peskan, also known as the 'Safari Zone'.
 @>Text: \pgIt is a big, controlled area in which the natural flow and habitat of the Pokémon there are maintained.
 @>Text: \pgIf the ecosystem gets interrupted, the keepers of the Safari Zone will intervene and restore balance.
 @>Text: \pgIn severe cases, they may even import Pokémon from different regions in order to tip the scales back.
 @>Text: \pgIn any case, the Safari Zone is of the utmost importance, especially when they built such a huge city not too far away from it.
 @>Text: \pgAs the owner of the Safari Zone himself also said: "Someone has got to keep the balance between Civilization and Wildlife in check."
 @>Text: \pg
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100
@>Text: You put the book back.
@>

Event ID: 008
Event Name: size(2,1)
(X,Y): (008,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \xn[\PN]\pgThere's a book in here called "North vs South". Should I read it?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-20,-20,-20,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \pgThe Peskan region is split up between North and South. This has to do with the different political standpoints of the citizens.
 @>Text: \pgSouth Peskan residents are more about freedom and the environment, while North Peskans care more about monetary gain and status.
 @>Text: \pgThis has to do with the history of both parts of the region. North Peskan encountered a harsh winter decades ago, ruining their economy.
 @>Text: \pgBecause their economy dropped, the North Peskans were more concerned about status and money than other things.
 @>Text: \pgThe south, on the other hand, had been protected from the winter by a mysterious force coming from  Anakiwa Cave.
 @>Text: \pgBecause of this, South Peskans started to praise the environment for sparing them, and thus making them appreciate nature more and being less concerned 
  :    : about status.
 @>Text: \pgEven though there is no grudge between the two parts of the Peskan Region, to this day they are still separated.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100
@>Text: You put the book back.
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 008
Event Name: size(2,1)
(X,Y): (001,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \xn[\PN]\pgThere's a book in here called "Do's and Don'ts with Pokémon". Should I read it?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-20,-20,-20,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \pgDo: give Pokémon a lot of attention. A lot of Pokémon have separation anxiety.
 @>Text: \pgDon't: stare at wild Pokémon, this could seem like a challenge to them and you could get attacked.
 @>Text: \pgDo: leave mother Pokémon alone, as they are very protective of their babies, and will attack if you seem like a threat.
 @>Text: \pgDon't: feed wild Pokémon, as this could lead into an infestation of wild Pokémon, expecting to be fed.
 @>Text: \pgDo: groom your furry Pokémon, as their fur is very important to all furry Pokémon. It's kind of a part of their pride.
 @>Text: \pgDon't: pet any other trainers their Pokémon, as this could lead to jelousy in your own Pokémon, when they smell another trainer Pokémon's scent on you.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>Text: \xn[\PN]\pgThat could maybe come in handy.
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100
@>Text: You put the book back.
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Twine City Pokémon Center!
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = OFF
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(22)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = ON
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 17 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
:       : for i in 1..count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

 @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
 :       :   :POKEBALL, :GREATBALL, :ULTRABALL,
 :       :   :POTION, :SUPERPOTION, :HYPERPOTION,
 :       :   :MAXPOTION, :FULLRESTORE, :REVIVE,
 :       :   :ANTIDOTE, :PARALYZEHEAL,
 :       :   :AWAKENING, :BURNHEAL, :ICEHEAL,

 :       :   :POKETOY
 :       : ])
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0005: Defeated Gym 2] == ON
  @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
  :       :   :POKEBALL, :GREATBALL, :ULTRABALL,
  :       :   :POTION, :SUPERPOTION, :HYPERPOTION,
  :       :   :ANTIDOTE, :PARALYZEHEAL,
  :       :   :AWAKENING, :BURNHEAL, :ICEHEAL,

  :       :   :QUICKBALL, :TIMERBALL,
  :       :   :REPEL, :SUPERREPEL, :MAXREPEL
  :       : ])
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0004: Defeated Gym 1] == ON
   @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
   :       :   :POKEBALL, :GREATBALL,
   :       :   :POTION, :SUPERPOTION,
   :       :   :ANTIDOTE, :PARALYZEHEAL,
   :       :   :AWAKENING, :BURNHEAL, :ICEHEAL,
   :       :   :ESCAPEROPE,
   :       :   :ETHER, :ELIXIR,
   :       :   :REPEL, :SUPERREPEL
   :       : ])
   @>
  : Else
   @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
   :       :   :POKEBALL, :POTION,
   :       :   :ANTIDOTE, :PARALYZEHEAL,
   :       :   :AWAKENING, :BURNHEAL, :ICEHEAL,
   :       :   :ESCAPEROPE, :REPEL
   :       : ])
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.egg_generated?
 @>Text: \bAh, it's you!
 @>Text: \bWe were raising your Pokémon, and my goodness, 
  :    : were we surprised!
 @>Text: \bYour Pokémon was holding an Egg!
 @>Text: \bWe don't know how it got there, but your Pokémon 
  :    : had it.
 @>Text: \bYou do want it, don't you?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ReceiveEgg
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.party_full?
   @>Text: \bYou have no room for it right now... Come back 
    :    : when you've made room.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \me[Egg get]\PN received the Egg from the Day-Care 
   :    : Man.
  @>Text: \bYou take good care of it.
  @>Script: DayCare.collect_egg
  @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg = 0
  :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps = 0
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bI really will keep it. You do want this Egg, yes?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Jump to Label: ReceiveEgg
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \bWell all right then, I'll take it. Thank you.
   @>Text: \bThat is, I don't think we'll ever find another...
   @>Text: \bNo, no, I'm sure we'll find another one. I'm definitely 
    :    : sure of it!
   @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg = 0
   :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps = 0
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 0
  @>Text: \bI'm the Day-Care Man.
  @>Text: \bI help take care of the precious Pokémon of 
   :    : trainers.
  @>Text: \bAny Pokémon you'd like to have raised you can 
   :    : leave in my wife's care.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 1
  @>Script: DayCare.get_details(-1, 3, -1)
  @>Text: \bAh, it's you!\nGood to see you!
  @>Text: \bYour \v[3] is doing just fine.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 2
  @>Script: DayCare.get_details(0, 3, -1)
  :       : DayCare.get_details(1, 4, -1)
  :       : DayCare.get_compatibility(5)
  @>Text: \bAh, it's you!\nGood to see you!
  @>Text: \bYour \v[3] and \v[4] are doing just fine.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 0
   @>Text: \bThe two play with other Pokémon rather than with 
    :    : each other...
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 1
   @>Text: \bThe two don't seem to like each other much.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 2
   @>Text: \bThe two seem to get along.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 3
   @>Text: \bThe two seem to get along very well.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End

(When Cancel: Choice 2)

 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-20,-20,-20,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: \pgVery long ago, a man lived on the region of Peskan.
 @>Text: \pgThe man was curious about the Pokémon of the region, and went on a journey.
 @>Text: \pgHe met all sorts of Pokémon. In the mountains he met Slugma, a lava based Fire-type. It's very dangerous to touch, but it's also very friendly.
 @>Text: \pgIn the seas of Peskan he met Dratini, a very elegant yet powerful Dragon-type.
 @>Text: \pgBut, his most important encounter was a young Swinub, which he met during the winter.
 @>Text: \pgSwinub was very hot to the touch, a bad sign for any Ice-type Pokémon.
 @>Text: \pgThe man was curious as to how a young Swinub could get hot. But then he realized, it was not just the young Swinub.
 @>Text: \pgPiloswine, Sneasel, Spheal, all the Ice-type Pokémon were getting warm. Even the snow was starting to melt.
 @>Text: \pgApparently, during the 30 years that the man had journeyed the region, the rest of civilization was ruining the environment.
 @>Text: \pgBecause of civilization's pollution, earth was starting to warm up, which was making all the Ice-type Pokémon very sick.
 @>Text: \pgThat is when the man met a very special Pokémon.\nA little yellow star Pokémon, Jirachi.
 @>Text: \pgJirachi granted the man one wish, any wish.
 @>Text: \pgThe man could have wished for his personal gain. He could have wished for immortality, money or fame.
 @>Text: \pgBut the selfless man's wish to Jirachi was to keep the habitat of the Ice-types in a permanent state of winter, in order to heal them.
 @>Text: \pgBecause of his selfless act, the locals dubbed him the Great Anakiwa, and made him a legend.
 @>Text: \pgThe man, Jirachi and the Ice-types lived happily ever after.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>Text: \xn[\PN]\pgI suppose Anakiwa City was named after this "Great Anakiwa'.
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100
@>Text: You put the book back.
@>

Autonomous Movement

 @>Text: \rAh, there you are! My husband was looking for 
  :    : you.
 @>Jump to Label: End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
@>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 0
 @>Text: \rI'm the Day-Care Lady. We can raise Pokémon for 
  :    : you.
 @>Text: \rWould you like us to raise your Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.pokemon_count <= 1
   @>Text: \rOh? But you only have one Pokémon with you.
   @>Text: \rYou can't go off without a Pokémon. Come back 
    :    : another time.
   @>Jump to Label: End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \rWhich Pokémon should we raise for you?
  @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1, 3)
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>Text: \rOh, fine, then.\nCome again.
   @>Jump to Label: End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: !$player.has_other_able_pokemon?(pbGet(1))
   @>Text: \rIf you leave me that Pokémon, what are you gonna 
    :    : battle with?
   @>Text: \rCome back another time.
   @>Jump to Label: End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Script: DayCare.deposit(pbGet(1))
  @>Text: \rFine, we'll raise your \v[3] for a while.
  @>Text: \rCome back for it later.
  @>Label: RaiseAnother
  @>Text: \rWe can raise two of your Pokémon. Would you like 
   :    : us to raise another?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.pokemon_count <= 1
    @>Text: \rOh? But you only have one Pokémon with you.
    @>Text: \rYou can't go off without a Pokémon. Come back 
     :    : another time.
    @>Jump to Label: End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: \rWhich Pokémon should we raise for you?
   @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1, 3)
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Text: \rVery good. Come again.
    @>Jump to Label: End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: !$player.has_other_able_pokemon?(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: \rIf you leave me that Pokémon, what are you gonna 
     :    : battle with?
    @>Text: \rCome back another time.
    @>Jump to Label: End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: DayCare.deposit(pbGet(1))
   @>Text: \rFine, we'll raise your \v[3] for a while.
   @>Text: \rCome back for it later.
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == ON
    @>Jump to Label: TakeBack
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rVery good. Come again.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rOh, fine, then.\nCome again.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rAh, it's you! Good to see you. Now, about your 
  :    : Pokémon...
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.get_level_gain(0, 3, 4) && pbGet(4) > 0
  @>Text: \rBy level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.get_level_gain(1, 3, 4) && pbGet(4) > 0
  @>Text: \rBy level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 1
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>Jump to Label: RaiseAnother
  @>
 : Else
  @>Label: TakeBack
  @>Text: \rDo you want your Pokémon back?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Label: TakeBackChosen
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.party_full?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon team is full. Make room, then come 
     :    : see me.
    @>Jump to Label: End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: DayCare.choose(
   :       :   _I("Which one do you want back?"),
   :       :   1
   :       : )
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Text: \rVery good. Come again.
    @>Jump to Label: End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: DayCare.get_details(pbGet(1), 3, 4)
   @>Text: \G\rIf you want your \v[3] back, it will cost $\v[4].
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = Gold
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] < Variable [0004: Temp Move Name]
     @>Text: \G\rYou don't have enough money...
     @>Jump to Label: End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Change Gold: - Variable [0004: Temp Move Name]
    @>Script: DayCare.withdraw(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: \G\rExcellent\nHere's your Pokémon.
    @>Text: \PN took \v[3] back from the Day-Care Lady.
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 1
     @>Text: \rDo you want to take back the other one, too?
     @>Show Choices: Yes, No
     (When Cancel: Choice 2)
     : When [Yes]
      @>Jump to Label: TakeBackChosen
      @>
     : When [No]
      @>Text: \rVery good. Come again.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: \rVery good. Come again.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Text: \rVery good. Come again.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \rVery good. Come again.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: End
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0083] == OFF
 @>Text: \rHere, take this Pokémon egg.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGenerateEgg(:PICHU)
  @>Text: \me[Egg get]\PN received an Egg from the Day-Care Lady.
  @>Text: \rYou take good care of it.
  @>Control Switches: [0083] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rYou have no room for it right now... Come back when you've made room.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.refresh
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Toledo Village Pokémon Center!
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = OFF
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(22)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = ON
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 17 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
:       : for i in 1..count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Memorize BGM/BGS
 @>Fade Out BGM: 1 sec.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-20,-20,-20,0), @20
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Play BGM: 'DPPT 040 Floaroma Town (Night)', 80, 100
 @>Text: \pgRelics such as the Relic Crown are remnants of ancient civilizations.
 @>Text: \pgThese ancient civilizations would use copper, silver and gold coins as their currency.
 @>Text: \pgSome relics contain artwork of Pokémon similar to the ones of today, but slightly different.
 @>Text: \pgAn example being a Piloswine with bigger tusks and a more defined face.
 @>Text: \pgRelics can be very valuable depending on how much of history they contain.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>Fade Out BGM: 1 sec.
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Restore BGM/BGS
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'GUI storage put down', 80, 100
@>Text: You put the book back.
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Anakiwa City Pokémon Center!
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = OFF
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(22)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = ON
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 17 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
:       : for i in 1..count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

 @>Text: \rYou will battle an endless amount of trainers, and for every 5th battle you get a reward. Additionally, you can quit at any time.

 : When [No]

Event ID: 008
Event Name: EV008
(X,Y): (023,016)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 11

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rCan I ask you something?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rI brought my Mawile and Sableye from the north here. But they cant seem to get along.
 @>Text: \rYou see, North Peskan Sableye and Mawile are natural enemies.
 @>Text: \rWould you mind taking one off my hands? You seem like a capable trainer.
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \rWhich one would you like to take care of?
  @>Show Choices: Sableye, Mawile
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Sableye]
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>Control Variables: [0029: battle outcome] = 1
   @>Script: vSST(9,"A")
   :       : vSST(10,"B")
   @>Script: pkmn = Pokemon.new(:SABLEYE,20)
   :       : pkmn.gender = 0
   :       : pkmn.item = GameData::Item.get(:SOOTHEBELL).id
   :       : GameData::Stat.each_main do |s|
   :       :      pkmn.iv[s.id_number] = 31
   :       : end
   :       : pkmn.givePokerus
   :       : pkmn.form = 1
   :       : pkmn.reset_moves
   :       : pbAddPokemon(pkmn,20)
   @>
  : When [Mawile]
   @>Control Variables: [0029: battle outcome] = 2
   @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
   @>Script: vSST(10,"A")
   :       : vSST(9,"B")
   @>Script: pkmn = Pokemon.new(:MAWILE,20)
   :       : pkmn.gender = 1
   :       : pkmn.item = GameData::Item.get(:SOOTHEBELL).id
   :       : GameData::Stat.each_main do |s|
   :       :      pkmn.iv[s.id_number] = 31
   :       : end
   :       : pkmn.givePokerus
   :       : pkmn.form = 1
   :       : pkmn.reset_moves
   :       : pbAddPokemon(pkmn,20)
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Script: vSST(5,"B")
  @>Text: \rPlease take good care of it!
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rThat's alright.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rThat's alright.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 001
Event Name: Normal meteor
(X,Y): (012,008)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.has_species?(:DEOXYS)
 @>Text: Deoxys is reacting to the meteor...
 @>Text: Would you like to bring the Deoxys in your party 
  :    : closer to the meteor?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: $player.pokemon_party.each do |pkmn|
  :       :   next if !pkmn.isSpecies?(:DEOXYS)
  :       :   pkmn.form = 0
  :       :   pbSet(1, pkmn.name)
  :       :   break
  :       : end
  @>Text: \v[1] has changed to have balanced stats!
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: Left the meteor alone.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: It's an irregular-looking rock.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 @>Text: \bHey, you look like a professional Pokémon catcher!
 @>Text: \bI'm trying to write an article about a certain Pokémon here, but I'm a bit stuck.
 @>Text: \bSee, I'm trying to write about a Pokémon called \rMisdreavus\b, but I've never actually seen one...
 @>Text: \bI heard that \rMisdreavus\b like to hang out around \rSpectra Graveyard\b.
 @>Text: \bCould you please try to catch one and show it to me?
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \bWhat's up? Did you bring me the Pokémon I needed?
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.has_species?(:MISDREAVUS)
  @>Text: \bOh! Ohh! Ohhh! That's it! \rMisdreavus\b!\nThanks! Let me get a closer look!
  @>Text: \b...I see, hmhm... Right, right... That's it!
  @>Text: \bThank you! I can write a great article now!
  @>Text: \bThis is for your trouble. It's not much, but thanks!
  @>Script: vRI(:NUGGET)
  @>Text: \bYou really came through for me! I hope I'll see you again sometime.
  @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \b...I see, hmhm...
  @>Text: \bCome back when you can show me a \rMisdreavus\b. I heard they like to roam around \rSpectra Graveyard\b.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 001
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Merlow City Pokémon Center!
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = OFF
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(22)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
 @>Control Switches: [0072: Ranch] = ON
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 17 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC_115_Nurse_1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_off(false)
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: count = $player.pokemonCount
:       : for i in 1..count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle_on(true)
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC_115_Nurse_1', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>
